column4: Hello. I need to build the Octave from source And before to do it I should install some depend applications. How know What can mean "a TeX distribution"????????
why not install Octave from usual repositories
I don't satisfy by octave 3.0 (because of some functions from 3.0.1 work bette and more usefull (like vander()) at the other hand octave 3.0 is bulded better) So I decide to compile from source.
